meanings.definition: Having great physical strength and power.
meanings.sent1: The wrestler was the brawniest athlete on the team.
meanings.sent2: He is the brawniest player in the football team.
meanings.sent3: The brawniest man in the gym accidentally lifted the wrong weight.
meanings.sent4: Her determination made her the brawniest competitor in the race.
meanings.sent5: The brawniest lion in the jungle roared with dominance.

meanings.definition: The strongest or most muscular person in a group.
meanings.sent1: In the weightlifting competition, he proved to be the brawniest.
meanings.sent2: The brawniest of the group easily carried the heavy boxes.
meanings.sent3: The brawniest guy at the party won all the arm-wrestling matches.
meanings.sent4: She was the brawniest in the class, always winning physical challenges.
meanings.sent5: The brawniest of the knights protected the kingdom with unmatched strength.
